newsitem.title: USA: SCI Systems sets two-for-one stock split.
newsitem.headline: SCI Systems sets two-for-one stock split.

text.p: SCI Systems Inc said Tuesday that its board of directors had authorized a two-for-one common stock split in the form of a 100-percent stock dividend.
SCI said in a statement the dividend will be payable on August 22 to shareholders of record as of August 8.
Post-split shares outstanding will be 59.8 million and 72.8 million fully diluted, it added.
SCI Systems provides engineering, manufacturing, and support services to original equipment manufacturers in the computer, communications, medical, defense, and entertainment industries.
